[STRIKE]$125[/STRIKE][STRIKE] $110[/STRIKE] $100 for the whole group[/STRIKE] moved to eBay
Prices dropped. Armstrong and the Imperials (weren't they a Motown act?) are still available.

Glen, I got the Knabe yesterday. That was quick!

Thanks again.
A bump for Glenn.  Got the Hoffman today and it's beautiful, thanks again!

An unsolicited pitch for Glenn--apart from Booles, Armstrong is one of the scarcest cards in the T209-1 set. 

Best wishes for the sale!

Cheers,
Mike

Zach, Dan, Michael, thank you all.

Any interest in the remaining cards? I can break up the C46 group if there are any type card seekers or set builders who just want a card or two.
Bump for final price drop on Armstrong
